biotools.summary: semantically annotated corpus for pharmacovigilence (PV), consisting of 597 MEDLINE abstracts. Its fine-grained, multiple levels of annotation, added by domain-experts, make it a unique resource within the field, and aim to encourage the development/adaption of novel machine learning tools for extracting PV-related information from text.

bioschemas.name: PHAEDRA
